name: POST Create Pod - Multiple Validation Errors

request.description: Tests comprehensive validation error collection. This payload intentionally violates multiple validation rules simultaneously: missing/empty fields, invalid pod name (uppercase + underscore), invalid resources type, invalid image URL, and non-existent server. The API should collect ALL these errors and return them together, demonstrating the improved validation logic that doesn't stop at the first error.

body.error: Missing or empty fields: machine_ip, username, password | Pod name must be lowercase. | Pod name must not contain underscores. | Image URL must start with https:// and contain a version tag (e.g., :latest). | Resources must be a dictionary/object | Server not found
